How to install:
    npm install -g ethereumjs-testrpc

Init:
    testrpc --account="0x83c14ddb845e629975e138a5c28ad5a72a49252ea65b3d3ec99810c82751cc3a,1000000000000000000000" --account="0xd3b6b98613ce7bd4636c5c98cc17afb0403d690f9c2b646726e08334583de101,500000000000000000000" --account="0x83c14ddb845e629975e138a5c28ad5a72789252ea65b3d3ec99810c82751cc3a,500000000000000000000" --unlock "0xaec3ae5d2be00bfc91597d7a1b2c43818d84396a"

Accounts created:
    0xAec3aE5d2BE00bfC91597d7A1b2c43818d84396A (Main, unlocked)
    0xf1f42f995046E67b79DD5eBAfd224CE964740Da3
